org.oddjob.images

Class IconHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.oddjob.images.IconHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iconic

    public class IconHelper
extends Object
implements Iconic
    Icons for the JobTree. All from Anthony's WWW Images. Java Look and Feel Graphics.
    Author:
    Rob Gordon
